V

validateInt(int, String) - Method in class businesslayer.TitleBusinessLogic
Void method that validates an integer.
validateISBN(Title) - Method in class businesslayer.TitleBusinessLogic
Void method that validates the ISBN to make sure a duplicate ISBN is not entered.
validateString(String, String, int, boolean) - Method in class businesslayer.TitleBusinessLogic
Void method that validates a String.
validateTitle(Title) - Method in class businesslayer.TitleBusinessLogic
Void method that calls validateString and validateInt methods, passing the Title object to these methods for validation.
ValidationException - Exception in businesslayer
This class holds constructors that indicate data validation exceptions.
ValidationException() - Constructor for exception businesslayer.ValidationException
Default constructor.
ValidationException(String) - Constructor for exception businesslayer.ValidationException
Parameterized constructor that takes a String.
ValidationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception businesslayer.ValidationException
Parameterized constructor that takes a String and Throwable.
ValidationException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception businesslayer.ValidationException
Parameterized constructor that takes a Throwable.
